summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 31, Gilman Park Addition, being the alley between West 59th Street and West 60th Street, from 15th Avenue Northwest and 17th Avenue Northwest, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9451 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
